ComicInfo.Title: --To Rise Again!; Inhuman at Large!
ComicInfo.Summary:
--To Rise Again!: Thor battles the Destroyer to a standstill, not knowing that it is Sif's life force that animates the creature. Odin decides that Thor has been punished long enough and restores his full power. Meanwhile, Ulik and a Troll army attack Karnilla's castle, and she releases Balder from her thrall so that he can fight for her.
Inhuman at Large!: Triton escapes from the humans who captured him.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:31:48. [Issue ID 21804]
